divs: sighting details07\14\09 my son and i went into the backyard about 15:20 to throw baseball, he had a game later in the afternoon and wanted to warm up. while out throwing, we always hear aircraft in the sky, since there is airports near-by, and tend to look up at them briefly when we hear them. on this occasion though it sounded like an "swooshing" jet engine noise in the sky that abruptly stopped. i was looking around in the sky for the plane, when to the east i saw what at first looked like a brownish red balloon. when i realized it was too round to be a balloon, the object "leveled off" and seemed to reflect in the sun as rotated up and headed north-northeast. no sound was coming from the object. i called to my son, pointing and following the object in the sky. we watched as this object with no sound or a vapor trail sped out of view faster than anything i have ever seen. i am a veteran of the usmc that was stationed on airfields during my service. i have seen a lot of military aircraft. this was something that i have never seen before. thought about calling local media just to see if anyone else had seen this, but at time felt i would be ridiculed and embarrassed. my son seen it after it leveled off, but seen it speed away.
